title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled but do not have any effect when moved. This can be misleading, especially when opening a small image such as an icon.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. However, when attempting to move them, they do not have any effect.
SR:
1. Launch Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled but cannot be moved to affect the displayed image.
